Address: 3471 RIVER HILLS DR, CINCINNATI, Ohio, 45244, United States of America
Industry: Biotechnology: In Vitro & In Vivo Diagnostic Substances
CompanyDescription: Meridian is a fully-integrated life science company with principal businesses in: (i) the development, manufacture, sale and distribution of diagnostic test kits, primarily for certain gastrointestinal and respiratory infectious diseases, and elevated blood lead levels; and (ii) the manufacture and distribution of bulk antigens, antibodies, PCR/qPCR reagents, nucleotides, and bioresearch reagents used by IVD manufacturers and researchers in immunological and molecular tests for human, animal, plant and environmental applications. The Company was incorporated in Ohio in 1976. Our principal corporate offices are located near Cincinnati, Ohio, USA. Our website is www.meridianbioscience.com .  ... More ...
